title: Why Google does not provide any explanation for cancelled order by Google?
content: I contacted the Google support and the team for cancelled orders, because Google has cancelled my Pixel order without any explanation. I paid, all was good and suddenly the status of the order went to "cancelled". It was ordered on the Google`s birthday with a discount from Germany.  I wrote them 5-6 emails and there had not been any information for almost 2 weeks already. How do they expect to have customers? If they want to sell the phone only at its original price, then just do not make these discounts to cheat the people...
